name: Fast Worms
description:
Inch your way down the long track of dirt. Sounds fun doesn't it? Well, it certainly is fun! Play as many different unlock-able worm characters. Earn coins, dig and jump over obstacles and... Maybe, just maybe, you can become the Wormey Leader!

Features:

- AMAZING ON IPHONE X!
-18 Worms (includes Xmas worm!)
- Day and night
- High Scores
- Simple gameplay
- Easy to learn
- Do not need to spend forever to play
- Casual gameplay
- Much, much more!
